member.name: IMFPMediaPlayerCallback.OnMediaPlayerEvent

summary.div: Important Deprecated. This API may be removed from future releases of Windows. Applications should use the Media Session for playback.
summary.para: Called by the MFPlay player object to notify the application of a playback event.

member.param: Pointer to an structure that contains information about the event.

summary.div: Important Deprecated. This API may be removed from future releases of Windows. Applications should use the Media Session for playback.
summary.para: To set the callback, pass an IMFPMediaPlayerCallback pointer to the function in the pCallback parameter. The application implements the IMFPMediaPlayerCallback interface.
